name: UpdateServiceIntegration
description:
Update an integration for a specific service.

Use this tool to update an integration that belongs to a specific service in PagerDuty. Services represent applications, components, or teams for incident management. Appropriate for when you need to modify integration settings or details.

parameters.name: resource_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the resource to be updated.

parameters.name: service_integration_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the integration associated with the service to update. This ID specifies which integration to modify.

value_schema.description: The integration ID on the service.

parameters.name: accept_version_header
parameters.description: The `Accept` header for versioning the API response format.

value_schema.description: The `Accept` header is used as a versioning header.

parameters.name: content_type
parameters.description: The media type for the request body. Use 'application/json'.

parameters.name: integration_update_details
parameters.description: JSON object containing the details of the integration to be updated.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Pagerduty API.

parameters.name: integration_id
parameters.description: The integration ID on the service.

value_schema.description: The integration ID on the service.

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: The `Accept` header is used as a versioning header.

value_schema.description: The `Accept` header is used as a versioning header.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
